message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the product is worth less than $20,000 to me. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Let me know if we can reach an agreement.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is already a competitive price for this product.  To make a deal, I'm willing to come down to $17,000. This is my final offer.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment, I am willing to pay up to $15,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
